code: import Cookies from"js-cookie";export function themeReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:Cookies.get("darkTheme")?JSON.parse(Cookies.get("darkTheme")):false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"DARK":return true;case"LIGHT":return false;default:return state;}}
